data.title: Rahul Mahajan Height, Age, Wife, Family, Biography & More
data.meta_description: Rahul Mahajan is an Indian television personality and the son of the late BJP politician Pramod Mahajan. Check this page to read his biography - career, hobbies & much more!
data.text:

Some Lesser Known Facts About Rahul Mahajan

Does Rahul Mahajan alcohol?: Yes

Rahul Mahajan is the son of the former union cabinet minister, Pramod Mahajan.

His father, Pramod Mahajan was shot by his own brother, Pravin Mahajan in 2006.

His sister, Poonam Mahajan is also into politics. She became the President of Bharatiya Janata Party Yuva Morcha (BJYM) in December 2016.

He is a firm believer in Shirdi Sai Baba.

Earlier, Rahul Mahajan used to work with Jet Airways as a co-pilot for two years.

Later, he started working as a consultant for an American company.

He also set up his production company, Integral Productions, during the tenure of National Democratic Alliance (NDA) Government. This company produced a famous music and dance programme, Tak Dhina Dhin for Doordarshan.

In 2008, Rahul participated in the controversial reality show, Bigg Boss Season 2, and on the last day, he won a car. He was also named the Bada Dil Wala of the show.

He married his second wife “Dimpy Ganguli” during the reality show, Rahul Dulhaniya Le Jayega in 2010, but, the marriage didn’t go long, and the duo divorced in 2015.

In 2010, he, along with Kapil Sharma and Shikha Singh, won the comedy TV show ‘Jubilee Comedy Circus’ that was aired on Sony TV.

In 2012, Rahul Mahajan, along with his then-wife Dimpy Ganguli, participated in the dance reality TV show ‘Nach Baliye Season 5.’

In 2014, he entered as the wild card entry in ‘Bigg Boss Halla Bol.’

He was supposed to make his Bollywood debut with the film ‘3 Full and 3 Half,’ but, the film was never made.

In 2015, Rahul Mahajan exposed the dark side of Radhe Maa by tweeting her photos in mini-skirt on his Twitter account.

In December 2020, he opened up about his wedding to Natalya Ilina, a Russian actress who is 18 years younger than Mahajan. During an interview with ETimes, he revealed that soon after they tied the knot, Natalya converted to Hinduism.
